title: So... I want to play shorter games.
body:
And no ARAM is not an option, I still want my own private lane and my own champion to play. 
Also, I don't like TFT since that isn't really LoL.

When will we get small game modes like Nexus Blitz? Or One for All? Or URF? Something that only takes like 10 or 15 minutes.
Sadly since Twisted Treeline AND Dominion are gone what can I play except ARAM? Ah right,
**NOTHING.**

Thank you, Riot, only because a small number of players you removed two of great game modes. One that was unique and one that was only for three people...
